mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To turn candles into an experience of self-expression and emotional illumination, offering products that not only light up spaces, but also inspire connection with the cosmos and foster creativity through their aesthetic versatility.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be the leading brand in the pearl wax artisan candle market, recognized for merging art, functionality and spirituality, creating products that transform the home into a sanctuary of peace and cosmic harmony.

value.title: Value Proposition
value.content: Reusable pearl wax with unique designs that integrate with a variety of premium fragrances. Our celestial and spiritual aesthetic inspires serenity and emotional connection, while offering innovative functionality and versatility of use.
